summary: Classical antiquity is an ancient period in European history, lasting from around 800 BC to 476 AD. It mainly focuses on the cultures of ancient Greece and Rome, which had a huge impact on Europe, North Africa, and West Asia. This era is known for its art, philosophy, and influential ideas that shaped many aspects of Western society. It began with the early Greek poems of Homer and ended with the fall of the Western Roman Empire. Later, people admired this period, leading to the Renaissance and neo-classical movements.
title: Classical antiquity
